data.name: initMarble
data.description: create a new marble, store into chaincode state

data.name: readMarble
data.description: read a marble from chaincode state

data.name: delete
data.description: remove a marble key/value pair from state

data.name: transferMarble
data.description: transfer a marble by setting a new owner name on the marble

data.name: getMarblesByRange
data.description: performs a range query based on the start and end keys provided

data.name: transferMarblesBasedOnColor
data.description: transfer marbles of a given color to a new owner

input.value: string.concat("Marble does not exists for color: ", $flow.parameters.color)

data.name: queryMarblesByOwner
data.description: queries for marbles based on a passed-in owner

data.name: queryMarbles
data.description: uses a query string to perform a query for marbles

data.name: getMarblesByRangeWithPagination
data.description: performs a range query based on the start & end key, page size and a bookmark.

data.name: queryMarblesWithPagination
data.description: uses a query string, page size and a bookmark to perform a query for marbles

data.name: getHistoryForMarble
data.description: retrieve history of a specified marble

triggers.name: Transaction
triggers.description: create a new marble, store into chaincode state
